meanings.definition: Fribbled (verb): to waste time or engage in frivolous activity
meanings.sent1: She fribbled away the afternoon playing video games.
meanings.sent2: He always fribbled instead of doing his homework.
meanings.sent3: The cat fribbled with a ball of yarn, ignoring its food.
meanings.sent4: Time fribbled away like sand slipping through fingers.
meanings.sent5: The children fribbled happily in the park, enjoying the sunshine.

meanings.sent1: His fribbled decision led to a lot of trouble.
meanings.sent2: The fribbled clown made everyone laugh with his antics.
meanings.sent3: The fribbled puppy chased its tail in circles.
meanings.sent4: Her fribbled behavior at the party embarrassed her friends.
meanings.sent5: The fribbled hat made him stand out in the crowd.

meanings.definition: Fribbled (adverb): in a frivolous or wasteful manner
meanings.sent1: She spent money fribbled on unnecessary things.
meanings.sent2: He chatted fribbled with his friends instead of studying.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel hoarded nuts fribbled, forgetting where it hid them.
meanings.sent4: The leaves danced fribbled in the wind.
meanings.sent5: The water flowed fribbled down the stream, sparkling in the sunlight.
